title: Examples of BBC's sensationalism and inaccurate reporting
content:
On September 15, 2016, in the midst of a senate hearing and a witness with an unverifiable claims, they come up with an article with headline implying the validity of the witness' claims and giving premature impression to the public who are not fully aware of the hearing situation.

Philippines President Duterte 'once killed man with Uzi'
(updated from "Philippine President Duterte 'ordered political rivals killed'")
http://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-37370848
